success.supportInfo: If you need help, reach out to us:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: At TennisApp, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and related services.
privacy.questions: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content:
We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a reservation, or contact us for support. This may include:

• Name and contact information
• Account credentials
• Payment information
• Location data (with your consent)
• Device information
• Usage data and preferences

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content:
We use the information we collect to:

• Provide, maintain, and improve our services
• Process transactions and send related information
• Send you technical notices and support messages
• Respond to your comments and questions
• Analyze usage patterns and trends
• Personalize your experience

protection.title: Data Protection
protection.content:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage. This includes:

• Encryption of data in transit and at rest
• Regular security assessments
• Access controls and authentication
• Secure data storage practices

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content:
We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

• With your consent
• With service providers who assist in our operations
• To comply with legal obligations
• To protect our rights and safety
• In connection with a business transfer

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content:
You have the right to:

• Access your personal data
• Correct inaccurate data
• Request deletion of your data
• Object to processing
• Data portability
• Withdraw consent at any time

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

Email: privacy@tennisapp.com
Address: Ankara, Turkey

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to TennisApp. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully before using our platform.
terms.questions: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us at

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Turkey, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
By creating an account or using TennisApp, you agree to these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

You must be at least 18 years old to use our services. By using TennisApp, you represent that you meet this requirement.

services.title: Our Services
services.content:
TennisApp provides a platform for:

• Court reservations and management
• Tournament and league organization
• Club membership management
• Digital wallet and payment processing
• Communication between clubs and members
• Performance tracking and analytics

payments.title: Payments and Refunds
payments.content:
• All payments are processed securely through our payment providers
• Refund policies are determined by individual clubs
• Wallet balances are non-transferable between clubs
• We reserve the right to suspend accounts with outstanding balances
• Currency and pricing are determined by each club

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.content:
You agree not to:

• Violate any applicable laws or regulations
• Infringe on the rights of others
• Transmit harmful or malicious content
• Attempt to gain unauthorized access
• Interfere with the proper working of the service
• Create multiple accounts for fraudulent purposes

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content:
TennisApp is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for:

• Service interruptions or errors
• Loss of data or content
• Actions of third parties
• Indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
• Issues arising from club-member relationships

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes through the app or via email. Your continued use of TennisApp after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

kvkk.title: KVKK Aydınlatma Metni
kvkk.subtitle: Personal Data Protection Policy
kvkk.introduction: In accordance with the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 (KVKK), this disclosure text explains how TennisApp collects, processes, and protects your personal data.
kvkk.questions: For KVKK-related inquiries, please contact us at

purpose.title: Purpose of Data Processing
purpose.content:
Your personal data is processed for the following purposes:

• Providing and improving our services
• User account management
• Processing payments and transactions
• Communication and customer support
• Legal compliance and fraud prevention
• Analytics and service optimization

dataTypes.title: Types of Data Collected
dataTypes.content:
We may collect the following categories of personal data:

• Identity Information: Name, surname, date of birth
• Contact Information: Email, phone number, address
• Financial Information: Payment details, transaction history
• Location Data: GPS coordinates (with consent)
• Technical Data: Device information, IP address, usage logs

processing.title: Legal Basis for Processing
processing.content:
Your data is processed based on:

• Explicit consent
• Performance of a contract
• Legal obligations
• Legitimate interests
• Vital interests protection

As per KVKK Article 5 and 6, we ensure all processing activities have a valid legal basis.

security.title: Data Security Measures
security.content:
We implement technical and administrative measures including:

• SSL/TLS encryption for data transmission
• Encrypted database storage
• Access control and authentication systems
• Regular security audits
• Employee training on data protection
• Incident response procedures

rights.title: Your Rights Under KVKK
rights.content:
Under KVKK Article 11, you have the right to:

• Learn whether your data is being processed
• Request information about processing
• Learn the purpose of processing
• Know third parties to whom data is transferred
• Request correction of incomplete or incorrect data
• Request deletion or destruction of data
• Object to automated decision-making
• Seek compensation for damages

application.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
application.content:
To exercise your KVKK rights, you may:

• Email us at info@btennispadel.com
• Submit a written request to our registered address
• Use the in-app data request feature

We will respond to your request within 30 days as required by law. Identity verification may be required for security purposes.

hero.title: Building the Future of Sports Technology
hero.description: Be Tek. is a technology company dedicated to transforming how sports clubs operate and how athletes engage with their communities. Founded in 2019 in Ankara, we are on a mission to make sports club management seamless, efficient, and enjoyable.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower sports clubs worldwide with innovative technology solutions that enhance member experiences, streamline operations, and drive growth. We believe that great technology can transform the way people connect through sports.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the global standard for sports club management technology, creating a world where every club, regardless of size, has access to enterprise-grade tools and every athlete can focus on what they love most - playing sports.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide everything we do at Be Tek.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: From a small startup in Ankara to a growing international company.

team.title: Leadership Team
team.description: Meet the people driving innovation at Be Tek.

technology.title: Our Technology Stack
technology.description: We use cutting-edge technologies to build robust, scalable, and secure applications.

cta.title: Join Us in Shaping the Future
cta.description: Whether you want to join our team or bring TennisApp to your club, we would love to hear from you.

hero.title: Build the Future of Sports with Us
hero.description: Join a passionate team of engineers, designers, and sports enthusiasts who are transforming the sports club industry. We offer competitive salaries, great benefits, and the opportunity to make a real impact.

culture.title: Our Culture
culture.description: What makes Be Tek. a great place to work

benefits.title: Benefits & Perks
benefits.description: We take care of our team so they can focus on doing their best work

positions.noJobs: No open positions in this department at the moment

cta.title: Don't See the Right Role?
cta.description: We are always looking for talented people. Send us your CV and we will keep you in mind for future opportunities.

stripe.title: Stripe Connect Setup Guide
stripe.subtitle: Step-by-step integration guide
stripe.introText: Accept payments from customers worldwide with Stripe's secure payment infrastructure.
stripe.supportText: Visit Stripe documentation or contact support for assistance.

step1.title: Create Stripe Account
step1.text: First, you need a Stripe account. If you don't have one, create it now.

step2.title: Complete Business Verification
step2.text: Complete your business verification to unlock all features.
step2.warning: Verification may take 1-2 business days. Prepare your business documents.

step3.title: Choose Account Type
step3.text: Select the account type that best fits your needs.

step4.title: Get API Keys
step4.text: Retrieve your API keys from the Stripe dashboard.
step4.warning: Never share your secret key. Keep it secure.

step5.title: Configure Webhooks
step5.text: Set up webhooks to receive payment notifications.
step5.info: Webhooks are essential for real-time payment status updates.

step6.title: Test Integration
step6.text: Test your integration with Stripe's test cards.

step7.title: Go Live
step7.text: Switch to live mode when you're ready to accept real payments.
step7.warning: Make sure all tests pass before going live.

iyzico.title: iyzico Setup Guide
iyzico.subtitle: Turkish payment integration guide
iyzico.introText: Accept payments from Turkish customers with all major credit cards and bank transfers.
iyzico.supportText: Contact iyzico support for assistance with your integration.

step1.title: Apply for Merchant Account
step1.text: Start by applying for an iyzico merchant account.

step2.title: Prepare Documents
step2.warning: Document requirements vary based on business type.

step3.title: Configure Account
step3.text: Set up your merchant account settings.
step3.info: Make sure to configure notification URLs for payment status updates.

step4.title: Get API Keys
step4.text: Retrieve your API and Secret keys from merchant panel.
step4.warning: Keep your keys secure. Never expose them in client-side code.

step5.title: Sub-Merchant Setup
step5.text: Configure your sub-merchant type based on your business structure.

step6.title: Test Integration
step6.text: Test your integration with iyzico test cards.

step7.title: Configure Webhooks
step7.text: Set up callback URLs for payment notifications.
step7.info: Webhooks ensure real-time payment status synchronization.

step8.title: Go Live
step8.warning: Verify all test scenarios before going live.

paratika.title: Paratika Setup Guide
paratika.subtitle: Virtual POS integration guide
paratika.introText: Accept credit card payments with installment support through major Turkish banks.
paratika.supportText: Contact Paratika support for technical assistance.

step1.title: About Paratika
step1.text: Paratika is a virtual POS solution that works with all major Turkish banks.

step2.title: Apply for Account
step2.text: Contact Paratika sales team to apply for a merchant account.
step2.info: Processing time is typically 3-5 business days.

step3.title: Prepare Documents
step3.text: Gather your business documents for verification.

step4.title: Access Merchant Panel
step4.text: Once approved, access your merchant panel to get credentials.

step5.title: Get API Credentials
step5.text: Retrieve your merchant code, username, and password.
step5.warning: Store credentials securely. Never share them.

step6.title: Configure 3D Secure
step6.text: Set up 3D Secure for enhanced transaction security.
step6.info: 3D Secure is required for most transactions in Turkey.

step7.title: Configure Installments
step7.text: Set up installment options if you want to offer payment plans.

step9.title: Go Live
step9.text: Switch to production environment when ready.
step9.warning: Complete all tests before processing real transactions.

step10.title: Error Handling
step10.text: Familiarize yourself with common error codes and their meanings.
